Kuva Karak.description: The custom weapon of a fearsome Kuva Lich. It has greater reload speed, lower recoil and greater accuracy than the standard-issue Karak rifle.
Kuva Karak.name: KUVA KARAK

Mutalist Quanta.description: A bizarre union of Corpus technology and Infested biology, this automatic rifle can also deploy an irradiated airborne infested mass. Further field testing is required to fully understand the potential of this weapon.
Mutalist Quanta.name: MUTALIST QUANTA

Tipedo.description: With its crescent shaped blades flying in sweeping arcs and striking at tremendous speed, the Tipedo demands focus from those wishing to unlock its true power.
Tipedo.name: TIPEDO

Epitaph.description: Sevagoth's wrist-mounted sidearm fires a chilling slow-moving slab, guaranteed to slow enemies for easier marksmanship. Charge the shot to fire a punishing high-velocity, high critical chance slab that punches through barriers. Deals additional headshot damage in Sevagoth's hands.
Epitaph.name: EPITAPH

Falcor.description: Carve through enemies with surgical precision using this Corpus-tech glaive.
Falcor.name: FALCOR

Sarpa.description: Makes sweeping cuts punctuated by bursts of heavy gunfire.
Sarpa.name: SARPA

Grakata.description: Equipped with a huge Magazine and impressive Fire Rate, the Grakata is the preferred weapon of Grineer Lancers.
Grakata.name: GRAKATA

Tonbo.description: During the darkest days of the Old War many a Tenno relied solely on the Tonbo to keep them alive.
Tonbo.name: TONBO

Prisma Gorgon.description: Adorned with void hardened prisma crystal, this Gorgon variant is prized for its beauty and enhanced mechanics.
Prisma Gorgon.name: PRISMA GORGON

Supra.description: The SUPRA is a heavy laser gun with a short wind up time.
Supra.name: SUPRA

Knell.description: Ring the death knell. Headshots briefly turn this scoped pistol into a rapid-fire, Critical Damage fiend that uses no ammo. When used by Harrow, Knell has a 2-round mag.
Knell.name: KNELL

Dragon Nikana.description: The Dragon Nikana is forged from ancient Tenno steel. This is a master's weapon, only the most worthy of Tenno may wield it.
Dragon Nikana.name: DRAGON NIKANA

Silva & Aegis.description: This fiery sword and shield combination perfects the balance of Tenno offense and defense prowess. In the hands of a Master, even a defensive tool like a shield can be used as a weapon.
Silva & Aegis.name: SILVA & AEGIS

Glaive.description: Dating back to the time of the first Tenno, the Glaive is a uniquely deadly weapon. This multi-bladed disc is not only effective for melee combat; it can also be thrown like a boomerang to cut down enemies at a distance.
Glaive.name: GLAIVE

Kuva Ayanga.description: Sweep aside hordes of enemies with flaming fury of this powerful, automatic, grenade launching archgun.
Kuva Ayanga.name: KUVA AYANGA

Heat Dagger.description: This short blade weapon has limited range but comes out fast and can inflict fire damage.
Heat Dagger.name: HEAT DAGGER

Veldt.description: Precise calibration, rapid trigger-pull and a steady hand all combine to bring down the hardiest prey on two legs or four.
Veldt.name: VELDT

Zenistar.description: Scorch enemies with blistering blows, or set them ablaze with the flying fire disc.
Zenistar.name: ZENISTAR

Dread.description: Dread is the calling card of The Stalker. It fires arrows that can decapitate.
Dread.name: DREAD

Vulkar.description: Built by the Grineer for their elite troopers, the Vulkar is a devastating distance weapon. In the right hands it is capable of taking down targets long before they get into attack range.
Vulkar.name: VULKAR

Ignis.description: Ignis produces a stream of intense heat.
Ignis.name: IGNIS

Tigris Prime.description: An artifact of exquisite beauty. A weapon of deadly purpose.
Tigris Prime.name: TIGRIS PRIME

Kulstar.description: Rain hell on the enemy with this handheld cluster-rocket launcher.
Kulstar.name: KULSTAR

Sydon.description: Inflict maximum devastation with this massive Grineer trident.
Sydon.name: SYDON

Dual Heat Swords.description: With a Heat Sword in each hand, enemies reach their fiery demise twice as fast. Can connect with multiple targets at once.
Dual Heat Swords.name: DUAL HEAT SWORDS

Rakta Ballistica.description: This modified ballistica is the weapon of choice used by Red Veil Assassins to take out high-priority marks.
Rakta Ballistica.name: RAKTA BALLISTICA

Acceltra.description: Using a barrage of rapid-fire plasma rockets, Gaussâ€™ signature weapon lays down a path of destruction. Reloads are faster while sprinting, even more so in Gaussâ€™ hands. For safety, rockets arm after traveling a safe distance.
Acceltra.name: ACCELTRA

Trumna.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. A heavy, oversized automatic rifle with withering fire that delivers rapid heat damage. Secondary fire unleashes an arcing projectile that ricochets off surfaces and enemies, exploding on every impact.
Trumna.name: TRUMNA

Dual Skana.description: A shorter Skana in each hand. Can hit multiple targets.
Dual Skana.name: DUAL SKANA

Cerata.description: Twisted and tortured from exposure to the Infestation, this glaive becomes an absolute predator in the hands of the right Tenno.
Cerata.name: CERATA

Valkyr Prime Talons.description: These talons emerge when Valkyr Prime unleashes Hysteria.
Valkyr Prime Talons.name: VALKYR PRIME TALONS

Sobek.description: Sobek is a rapid-firing Grineer shotgun that has reduced damage per shot but boasts extra large magazine capacity.
Sobek.name: SOBEK

Daikyu.description: Daikyu takes great strength to draw back, but provides added power and range to every shot.
Daikyu.name: DAIKYU

Kuva Quartakk.description: Unlike a standard Quartakk this Kuva Lich variant fires automatically from the hip while retaining its signature feature when aimed: annihilating targets with four simultaneous shots.
Kuva Quartakk.name: KUVA QUARTAKK

Orvius.description: Turn foes into puppets with Teshinâ€™s versatile throwing disc.
Orvius.name: ORVIUS

Tekko Prime.description: As merciless and indestructible as Atlas Prime himself, Tekko Prime crush and split with tectonic force.
Tekko Prime.name: TEKKO PRIME

Prisma Twin Gremlins.description: Fused with prisma crystals, these pristine Grineer sidearms are sure to intimidate any foe.
Prisma Twin Gremlins.name: PRISMA TWIN GREMLINS

Snipetron Vandal.description: A customized version of the elusive Snipetron, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
Snipetron Vandal.name: SNIPETRON VANDAL

Arca Plasmor.description: Stagger targets with blasts from this Corpus engineered plasma shotgun. Surviving enemies are consumed with radiation.
Arca Plasmor.name: ARCA PLASMOR

Akbronco Prime.description: Used together, these Orokin pistols feed off each other, inflicting greater damage with an enhanced status chance for inducing elemental effects on targets.
Akbronco Prime.name: AKBRONCO PRIME

Spectra.description: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.
Spectra.name: SPECTRA

Bo.description: A two-handed, reinforced staff that can send multiple enemies airborne.
Bo.name: BO

Zenith.description: Deploy the radar disc to reveal hidden enemies and then strike with precisions shots that punch through all obstacles in the way.
Zenith.name: ZENITH

Arum Spinosa.description: Slash through enemies with two leaves of the exceedingly rare Arum Spinosa plant. Heavy Attack to whip a flurry of toxic spines at ranged attackers.
Arum Spinosa.name: ARUM SPINOSA

Cyngas.description: Unload deadly accurate bursts of mayhem.
Cyngas.name: CYNGAS

Telos Boltor.description: Bring down judgement, with this boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.
Telos Boltor.name: TELOS BOLTOR

Panthera Prime.description: The max-velocity saw-launcher perfected. Features a larger magazine, faster fire rate, and a radial, slashing ricochet.
Panthera Prime.name: PANTHERA PRIME

Cernos Prime.description: A noble bow to hunt hellish beasts.
Cernos Prime.name: CERNOS PRIME

Kuva Drakgoon.description: The Kuva Drakgoon flak cannon sends volleys of intensely hot shrapnel ricocheting around the room that do not slow down. Larger Magazine Capacity and Reload Speed. Can be fired in wide or concentrated bursts.
Kuva Drakgoon.name: KUVA DRAKGOON

Spira.description: A flash of red ribbon is the last thing most victims of these throwing-daggers see.
Spira.name: SPIRA

Heat Sword.description: A strong blade capable of inflicting <DT_SLASH>Slash Damage to its foes.
Heat Sword.name: HEAT SWORD

Dual Kamas.description: Wielding a Kama in each hand brings a savage amount of <DT_SLASH>Slash Damage to bear against your enemies.
Dual Kamas.name: DUAL KAMAS

Mios.description: This bone-forged sword includes a tendon-whip to distract and maim the enemy.
Mios.name: MIOS

Aklex Prime.description: Savage the enemy with a Lex Prime in each hand.
Aklex Prime.name: AKLEX PRIME

Synoid Heliocor.description: This intelligent hammer takes an enemy killed by a Heavy Attack and recomposes them as an ally. Any fatal strike with this weapon also performs a Codex scan.
Synoid Heliocor.name: SYNOID HELIOCOR

Miter.description: The Miter launches high velocity saw blades, tearing apart anyone unfortunate enough to be in their path.
Miter.name: MITER

Exalted Prime Blade.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.
Exalted Prime Blade.name: EXALTED PRIME BLADE

Vaykor Hek.description: Forged in the fires of rebel struggle, this shotgun is a force for liberation.
Vaykor Hek.name: VAYKOR HEK

Mk1-braton.description: The MK1-Braton is the standard issue rifle for all Tenno. A versatile weapon that can be customized to support a wide variety of play styles.
Mk1-braton.name: MK1-BRATON

Scindo Prime.description: An ancient executioners weapon, the honor of decapitation by the Scindo Prime was reserved for the Orokin's most respected enemies.
Scindo Prime.name: SCINDO PRIME

Cedo.description: Launch a glaive that ricochets off surfaces in bursts of elemental damage, then perforate enemies with primary fireâ€™s precision buck-shot. Damage increases with each Status Effect afflicting a target. Lavos will transmute a small portion of any ammo pickup to Shotgun Ammo when wielding his signature Cedo.
Cedo.name: CEDO

<archwing> Prisma Veritux.description: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the Voidâ€™s energy.
<archwing> Prisma Veritux.name: <ARCHWING> PRISMA VERITUX

Sepulcrum.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. This large, weighty double-barreled pistol delivers twin projectiles that pack a punch, exploding on impact. Secondary fire puts the weapon in lock-on mode. Aim to lock onto multiple targets, then fire to unleash homing projectiles.
Sepulcrum.name: SEPULCRUM

Reaper Prime.description: Reaper Prime is an ornamental scythe, with a blade forged from tempered Rubedo.
Reaper Prime.name: REAPER PRIME

Twin Kohmak.description: Doubling their volley on each successive shot, the Twin Kohmaks decimate foes in seconds.
Twin Kohmak.name: TWIN KOHMAK

Kuva Tonkor.description: This Lich-variant grenade launcher hurls mayhem and destruction with an increased Reload Speed.
Kuva Tonkor.name: KUVA TONKOR

Corinth.description: Deliver a massive punch with each blast of this shotgun, or launch a round that explodes mid-air knocking down nearby enemies.
Corinth.name: CORINTH

Ocucor.description: A weapon that reaches for its next victim even as it kills. With each takedown, this pistol spawns an energy tendril that reaches for a nearby target.
Ocucor.name: OCUCOR

Skana.description: Before all other weapons, Tenno master the Skana. This simple blade becomes immensely powerful in the hands of a master. For Tenno, it is the foundation of their fighting style and a pillar of their culture.
Skana.name: SKANA

Strun.description: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.
Strun.name: STRUN

Kuva Brakk.description: This Lich-variant semi-automatic hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package. Higher fire rate, magazine capacity and reload speed.
Kuva Brakk.name: KUVA BRAKK

Corvas.description: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.
Corvas.name: CORVAS

Gorgon.description: The Gorgon sports a large magazine that allows it to provide suppressing fire and sustain a high damage rate over a long time. Its high Fire Rate is only achieved following a short wind-up cycle.
Gorgon.name: GORGON

Sigma & Octantis.description: Deadly slashes from the Sigma sword are matched only by the force of the Octantis shield when thrown from the air.
Sigma & Octantis.name: SIGMA & OCTANTIS

Dera Vandal.description: A customized version of the Dera, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.
Dera Vandal.name: DERA VANDAL

Paris Prime.description: Discovered deep inside an ancient Orokin derelict, the Paris Prime increases the kinetic energy of any bolt it fires, dealing more damage than its more common counterpart.
Paris Prime.name: PARIS PRIME

Volnus Prime.description: The glorious original Orokin casting of Garaâ€™s signature glass hammer. Deceptively light and swift, while remaining lethally effective.
Volnus Prime.name: VOLNUS PRIME

Ferrox.description: Discharge a rail of ionized death or throw the Ferrox like a spear and create a localized field of attraction no enemy can escape from.
Ferrox.name: FERROX

<archwing> Centaur.description: Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.
<archwing> Centaur.name: <ARCHWING> CENTAUR

Sancti Castanas.description: This remotely detonated electrical trap is used by devotees of New Loka to protect their temples and shrines.
Sancti Castanas.name: SANCTI CASTANAS

Cernos.description: Evoking the design of ancient bows, the high impact Cernos is perfect for hunting down highly shielded enemies.
Cernos.name: CERNOS

Stinger.description: Standard issue weapon for Djinn Sentinel. Fires poisonous projectiles.
Stinger.name: STINGER

Sibear.description: Ice in motion can crush mountains, this frozen hammer is no different.
Sibear.name: SIBEAR

Pyrana Prime.description: Three kills in rapid succession to summon a second ethereal Pyrana for twice the deadly punch.
Pyrana Prime.name: PYRANA PRIME

Dual Cleavers.description: Butcher your foes with brutal blades in each hand.
Dual Cleavers.name: DUAL CLEAVERS

Tysis.description: The Tysis pistol spits out caustic darts that corrode their victims from within.
Tysis.name: TYSIS

Machete Wraith.description: A different take on a familiar combat knife, the Machete Wraith features unique styling.
Machete Wraith.name: MACHETE WRAITH

Dex Dakra.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
Dex Dakra.name: DEX DAKRA

Nukor.description: Creates and focuses a high-frequency field of microwaves, literally cooking the target from within.
Nukor.name: NUKOR

Brakk.description: Simple but powerful. The semi-automatic Brakk hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package.
Brakk.name: BRAKK

Prisma Angstrum.description: Imbued with the finest Prisma crystal, this refined Angstrum features boosted charge and reload speeds.
Prisma Angstrum.name: PRISMA ANGSTRUM

Buzlok.description: Mark your targets and unleash a barrage of bullets, the Buzlok's homing rounds always find the enemy. Marked targets are more likely to take critical hits.
Buzlok.name: BUZLOK

Furax.description: These power gauntlets lack the range of most Melee Weapons, but Furax is far more devastating when you strike an enemy in close combat.
Furax.name: FURAX

Phantasma.description: Irradiate enemies with a continuous stream of deadly plasma. Charging secondary fire releases a glob of plasma that erupts with homing bomblets on impact. Increased Magazine Capacity when wielded by Revenant.
Phantasma.name: PHANTASMA

Mire.description: A relic from the Great Plague, the Mire Infested Sword is a brutal weapon. It not only cuts into the enemy, it infects the wounds of its victim with a toxic nerve poison. Deals <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage on Ground Slam attacks.
Mire.name: MIRE

Plinx.description: Cultivate a meaningful relationship with this deceptively simple battery-powered pistol. The Plinx rewards attention and investment from the wise.
Plinx.name: PLINX

Latron.description: The Latron is a highly efficient rifle that performs well at medium and at long range, its accuracy making it a deadly weapon in the hands of skilled marksmen.
Latron.name: LATRON

Laser Rifle.description: A laser rifle developed by reverse-engineering Corpus technology.
Laser Rifle.name: LASER RIFLE

Lanka.description: The Lanka fires a high velocity projectile through magnetic induction.
Lanka.name: LANKA

Vectis.description: A classic Tenno sniper rifle, the Vectis is ideal for ranged takedowns.
Vectis.name: VECTIS

Akbolto.description: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the Magazine Capacity and slightly faster Fire Rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
Akbolto.name: AKBOLTO

Kuva Shildeg.description: A crushing, killing, rocket-powered stab-hammer. Grineer, naturally.
Kuva Shildeg.name: KUVA SHILDEG

Deth Machine Rifle.description: Standard issue weaponry signature to Dethcube.
Deth Machine Rifle.name: DETH MACHINE RIFLE

Karyst.description: Once the blade weapon of choice for an exclusive order of Tenno assassins, the Karyst dagger grew to become a symbol of honor and duty for all Tenno.
Karyst.name: KARYST

Ceramic Dagger.description: This short blade weapon was built using ceramic. It has limited range but comes out fast.
Ceramic Dagger.name: CERAMIC DAGGER

Tenora.description: Unload percussive machine gun fire, or strike a heavy chord with a single charge shot. When Octavia wields her signature rifle alt-fire Headshot Kills have a chance to instantly refill the magazine.
Tenora.name: TENORA

Ankyros Prime.description: This Orokin variation of the Ankyros is superior to its successor in every way.
Ankyros Prime.name: ANKYROS PRIME

Tonkor.description: Hurl mayhem and destruction with this Grineer grenade launcher.
Tonkor.name: TONKOR

Prisma Grinlok.description: Prisma-crystal enhancement creates here a prestige instrument; a weapon capable of taking life at astonishing range with but a single pull of its exquisitely-tooled trigger.
Prisma Grinlok.name: PRISMA GRINLOK

Tatsu.description: Fearsome and noble, the elegant two-handed Nikana is the pride of any Arsenal. Kills build charges and seeking projectiles are unleashed with a Slide Attack to find and stun unwitting enemies. When Revenant wields this blade, Tatsuâ€™s charge cap is increased.
Tatsu.name: TATSU

Redeemer Prime.description: Deal double-bladed, double-barreled death with this primed gunblade.
Redeemer Prime.name: REDEEMER PRIME

Synoid Gammacor.description: Deployed by the Cephalon Suda, once a data-analyzing instrument the Gammacor main focus is defense.
Synoid Gammacor.name: SYNOID GAMMACOR

Okina.description: Perforate enemies with these two needle-sharp sai.
Okina.name: OKINA

Pathocyst.description: Each strike of this infested glaive infects its target with viral pathogens. Occasionally, it discharges the spores of rabid, enemy-seeking maggots, either in-flight or on contact with the enemy.
Pathocyst.name: PATHOCYST

Halikar Wraith.description: A different take on the throwing mace, the Halikar Wraith features unique styling.
Halikar Wraith.name: HALIKAR WRAITH

Gunsen.description: Lacerate attackers with two razor sharp warfans.
Gunsen.name: GUNSEN

Stug.description: Firing a sticky, toxic, explosive compound, the Stug Gel Gun offers multiple ejection modes, delivering maximum damage in all situations.
Stug.name: STUG

Volnus.description: Tear and maim with this agile, lightweight glass hammer. When Gara's wields her signature melee weapon, it gains additional Slam Radial Damage.
Volnus.name: VOLNUS

Dex Furis.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
Dex Furis.name: DEX FURIS

Quartakk.description: Annihilate targets with four simultaneous shots from this high-caliber Grineer rifle.
Quartakk.name: QUARTAKK

Aklato.description: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the Magazine Capacity and Fire Rate, but Reload time is doubled and Accuracy is lowered.
Aklato.name: AKLATO

Pandero Prime.description: Pound the beat for a dance of death with Octavia's signature prime pistol.
Pandero Prime.name: PANDERO PRIME

Paracyst.description: Completely overwhelmed by Infested biology, this former Quanta now fires organic ordnance and a harpoon like appendage.
Paracyst.name: PARACYST

Lenz.description: Bolts from this Corpus bow deliver a one-two punch of an icy pulse, followed by a conventional explosion. Excess ammo picked up for other weapons will be converted into charges for the Lenz.     Warning: Safety-protocols do not exist on this prototype.
Lenz.name: LENZ

Rakta Dark Dagger.description: Infiltrate undetected; reduced visibility when held. Then strike with confidence; hits to irradiated targets restores shields and creates overshields.
Rakta Dark Dagger.name: RAKTA DARK DAGGER

Cronus.description: A strong blade forged using ceramic.
Cronus.name: CRONUS

Castanas.description: The remotely triggered Castanas quietly deliver a lethal dose of electricity to unsuspecting enemies.
Castanas.name: CASTANAS

Cycron.description: Forgo ammunition with the regenerating energy disc in this plasma throwing pistol.
Cycron.name: CYCRON

Prisma Tetra.description: When bathed in Void energy and prisma crystal, the simple Tetra becomes a beacon of style and intimidation.
Prisma Tetra.name: PRISMA TETRA

Kuva Ogris.description: The custom weapon of a fearsome Kuva Lich. Unlike the basic version the Kuva Ogris fires detonite-infused casings semi-automatically, from a smaller magazine, while dealing greater damage per shot.
Kuva Ogris.name: KUVA OGRIS

Ether Daggers.description: A shorter version of the Ether blade that allows for a more focused attack on a single target.
Ether Daggers.name: ETHER DAGGERS

Pupacyst.description: A two-pronged attack; the bone-grafted cocoon at the tip of this polearm rends flesh, while the viral mass living within spreads itself into the wounds of each new victim.
Pupacyst.name: PUPACYST

Viper Wraith.description: The uniquely styled Viper Wraith is a powerful variation on the standard machine-pistol.
Viper Wraith.name: VIPER WRAITH

Twin Krohkur.description: Battlefield butchery becomes all too easy with a Krohkur blade in each hand.
Twin Krohkur.name: TWIN KROHKUR

Mara Detron.description: For Orokin-era smugglers, this fearsome handheld shotgun was a favored tool for 'dispute resolution'.
Mara Detron.name: MARA DETRON

Baza Prime.description: This rapid-fire classic is the Orokin-engineered definition of silent, pinpoint lethality.
Baza Prime.name: BAZA PRIME

Korrudo.description: When they go high, go low. Powerful pneumatic grips and toecaps amplify every blow. Four ways to deal twice the pain.
Korrudo.name: KORRUDO

Phaedra.description: Devastate free-space enemies with Phaedra, the Soma's big-sister.
Phaedra.name: PHAEDRA

Glaxion Vandal.description: A cutting-edge, halogen-cooled electron accelerator capable of snap-freezing a target in moments.
Glaxion Vandal.name: GLAXION VANDAL

Opticor.description: Once charged this Corpus laser cannon dispatches a devastating blast of light energy.
Opticor.name: OPTICOR

Sweeper Prime.description: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Prime Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.
Sweeper Prime.name: SWEEPER PRIME

Detron.description: The sleek lines of the Detron conceal its ferocious nature. The hand cannon's semi-automatic action takes down enemies with speed and efficiency.
Detron.name: DETRON

Endura.description: The delicate form of this Tenno rapier conceals its ferocious and resilient force.
Endura.name: ENDURA

Soma.description: Accuracy coupled with a massive magazine makes the Soma assault rifle a formidable weapon.
Soma.name: SOMA

Jaw Sword.description: A blade with a serrated edge that delivers strong quick attacks.
Jaw Sword.name: JAW SWORD

Tenora Prime.description: Add lethal staccato percussion to Octavia's melodies with this masterpiece assault rifle.
Tenora Prime.name: TENORA PRIME

Kohmak.description: Like the larger Kohm, this hand-shotgun doubles its volley with each successive shot.
Kohmak.name: KOHMAK

Gorgon Wraith.description: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.
Gorgon Wraith.name: GORGON WRAITH

Ankyros.description: A pair of mighty gauntlets, the Ankyros were designed by the Tenno for close quarters combat. What they lack in range they make up for in speed.
Ankyros.name: ANKYROS

Boar.description: A shotgun with low accuracy and strong recoil, but able to deliver its payload in full-auto. The Boar is best used at close range.
Boar.name: BOAR

Hystrix.description: Heat, cold, electricity, or toxin: choose an element and launch a flurry of deadly quills. This versatile sidearm is Khoraâ€™s signature weapon.
Hystrix.name: HYSTRIX

Burston Prime.description: Once thought lost to the ages, attempts to reengineer the Burston Prime never fully replicated this weapon's power and agility.
Burston Prime.name: BURSTON PRIME

Rakta Cernos.description: A finely tuned instrument of assassination.
Rakta Cernos.name: RAKTA CERNOS

Quatz.description: A compact four-barreled design packing a self-charging capacitor that discharges upon every reload from empty. Features auto hip-fire and aimed fire is semi-auto, four-shot instant burst.
Quatz.name: QUATZ

Vulkar Wraith.description: A blood-red variant of this devastating sniper rifle.
Vulkar Wraith.name: VULKAR WRAITH

Scourge.description: Blast targets with corrosive plasma projectiles, or toss the scepter to inflict an energy field upon nearby enemies that amplifies their brain waves to attract bullets.
Scourge.name: SCOURGE

Supra Vandal.description: A customized version of the powerful Supra, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.
Supra Vandal.name: SUPRA VANDAL

Ether Sword.description: A single blade for more precision. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for â€˜cleansingâ€™ infested allies.
Ether Sword.name: ETHER SWORD

Rubico.description: Scope out the enemy with this long-range revolver style rifle.
Rubico.name: RUBICO

Atterax.description: A multi-bladed whip that is adept at flaying skin from bone. In extreme cases, disobedient Grineer are sentenced to death by Atterax.
Atterax.name: ATTERAX

Carmine Penta.description: Enveloped in deep red composite enamel, this Penta variant features a higher fire-rate and over-sized magazine.
Carmine Penta.name: CARMINE PENTA

Cortege.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati for use by their Necramechs. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. A heavy flamethrower with surprising range. Secondary fire launches three projectiles in a fan pattern that explode, leaving a damaging area of effect for a short duration.
Cortege.name: CORTEGE

Heliocor.description: Obtain enlightenment with this massive hammer that performs a Codex scan on each fatal strike. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.
Heliocor.name: HELIOCOR

Prova.description: The Prova is a Melee Weapon that delivers a high-intensity shock to its target.
Prova.name: PROVA

Hate.description: Hate is a scythe with a cruel blade, wielded by The Stalker.
Hate.name: HATE

Twin Rogga.description: These twin barrels of destruction are the signature pistols of the Kuva Guardians.
Twin Rogga.name: TWIN ROGGA

Jat Kusar.description: Overwhelm hostiles with this jet-powered sickle and razor-chain weapon. Charged strikes ignite an explosive blast at range.
Jat Kusar.name: JAT KUSAR

Ohma.description: Bring the enemy to its knees with these twin electrified tonfas.
Ohma.name: OHMA

Imperator Vandal.description: The Imperator Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the barrel.
Imperator Vandal.name: IMPERATOR VANDAL

Tiberon.description: Forged by a master gunsmith, this Tenno burst rifle will strike down targets with swift precision.
Tiberon.name: TIBERON

Nami Skyla.description: Like the surge and crash of storm waves, a master of the Nami cutlass and Skyla dagger turns these two separate weapons into one fluid attack.
Nami Skyla.name: NAMI SKYLA

Kogake.description: These coverings for the hands and feet allow devastating high flying hand-to-hand combat attacks without risking harm to the user.
Kogake.name: KOGAKE

Silva & Aegis Prime.description: A perfectly crafted pairing, this mace and shield combination is sculpted for exhibition but balanced for the battlefield.
Silva & Aegis Prime.name: SILVA & AEGIS PRIME

Sheev.description: Built for close combat, the Sheev's plasma blade slices through flesh and armor with equal ease.
Sheev.name: SHEEV

Cassowar.description: Light and nimble, the twin blades of this polearm will swoop and slice through throngs of hardened foes.
Cassowar.name: CASSOWAR

Grinlok.description: With pinpoint accuracy, the Grinlok lever-action repeating rifle can easily find the soft spot on any target.
Grinlok.name: GRINLOK

Viper.description: A full-auto pistol known as the most compact and lightweight weapon of the Grineer arsenal. Though it has a small Magazine Capacity, the Viper has a very high Fire Rate and ultra-fast reload times thanks to a simplified magazine design.
Viper.name: VIPER

Lecta.description: Half taser, half whip. The Corpus Lecta delivers a deadly shock to anything it touches.
Lecta.name: LECTA

Skiajati.description: Forged of steel grafted from Umbra's flesh, this elegant Nikana unites with its Warframe to form a single being of seething purpose.
Skiajati.name: SKIAJATI

Plasma Sword.description: An advanced blade that delivers high-damage attacks. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
Plasma Sword.name: PLASMA SWORD

Multron.description: Fires a burst of armor-piercing rounds.
Multron.name: MULTRON

Deconstructor.description: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack enemy targets using pieces of itself.
Deconstructor.name: DECONSTRUCTOR

Prisma Burst Laser.description: Fires a small burst of lasers.
Prisma Burst Laser.name: PRISMA BURST LASER

Magnus.description: The versatile Magnus revolver is a lethal sidearm for any Tenno.
Magnus.name: MAGNUS

Braton Vandal.description: A special version of the standard Braton rifle with a slower Fire Rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Braton Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.
Braton Vandal.name: BRATON VANDAL

Velocitus.description: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.
Velocitus.name: VELOCITUS

Garuda's Talons.description: These nasty things come out when Garuda forgoes a melee weapon.
Garuda's Talons.name: GARUDA'S TALONS

Amprex.description: The Amprex rifle fires a continuous beam of high voltage electricity that arcs among nearby enemies. This weapon excels at Crowd Control.
Amprex.name: AMPREX

Soma Prime.description: Known for taking down whole squads with its single massive magazine, few weapons were as feared as the Prime Soma.
Soma Prime.name: SOMA PRIME

Kuva Hind.description: This powerful Grineer burst rifle has been retrofitted to add semi-automatic and automatic fire modes.
Kuva Hind.name: KUVA HIND

Scindo.description: The Scindo is a heavy war axe crafted by the Tenno. Reduced speed and agility is balanced by heavy, devastating strikes capable of connecting with multiple targets at once.
Scindo.name: SCINDO

Spira Prime.description: These rare, braided throwing daggers were a favorite tool of high ranking Orokin assassins.
Spira Prime.name: SPIRA PRIME

Kama.description: The Kama is a Tenno style hatchet, capable of making short work of any foe.
Kama.name: KAMA

Ninkondi.description: With its lightning-fast strikes, the Ninkondi pays respect to the old ways.
Ninkondi.name: NINKONDI

Kohm.description: For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kohm releases an additional bolt and grows more lethal.
Kohm.name: KOHM

Halikar.description: This jet powered Grineer throwing mace always comes back to its master and is even capable of disarming targets.
Halikar.name: HALIKAR

Kuva Seer.description: This variant pistol has higher fire rate and magazine capacity. Superior zoom capabilities plus projectiles have a small Corrosive burst.
Kuva Seer.name: KUVA SEER

Penta.description: The Penta Launcher fires up to five grenades that can be remotely triggered at just the right moment.
Penta.name: PENTA

Machete.description: A ferocious Melee Weapon crafted by the Grineer and carried by their elite melee forces.
Machete.name: MACHETE

Karak Wraith.description: A different take on the Grineer assault rifle, the Karak Wraith features unique styling.
Karak Wraith.name: KARAK WRAITH

Boltor.description: The Boltor fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
Boltor.name: BOLTOR

Bubonico.description: Rain down a triple volley of explosive disease bladders from a distance, then move in for the kill by unloading a multi-shot barrage of toxic barbs with primary fire.
Bubonico.name: BUBONICO

Stubba.description: Inflict rapid-fire bursts of pain with this Grineer submachine gun.
Stubba.name: STUBBA

Akjagara Prime.description: Precision machined mirrored pistols. Primed and ready.
Akjagara Prime.name: AKJAGARA PRIME

Akbronco.description: A Bronco equipped in each hand.
Akbronco.name: AKBRONCO

Dual Ether.description: Fast and precise. The Dual Ether cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for â€˜cleansingâ€™ infested allies. Capable of hitting multiple targets.
Dual Ether.name: DUAL ETHER

Nagantaka.description: Slash targets with a single precise bolt from Garuda's signature crossbow. Alt-fire to let loose a barrage of bolts. All bolts have a chance to cause Bleeding and Headshots have a chance to increase Reload Speed. When wielded by Garuda Nagantaka gains a slight Punch Through.
Nagantaka.name: NAGANTAKA

Tetra.description: Drawing from its huge quad-chambered magazine, the Tetra is capable of unleashing a sustained barrage of lethal energy bolts.
Tetra.name: TETRA

Pennant.description: The steel flag of Old War Railjack crews, the Pennant was invaluable in repelling boarders. With each heavy attack kill the Pennant's speed of attack increases.
Pennant.name: PENNANT

Lato Prime.description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.
Lato Prime.name: LATO PRIME

Ceti Lacera.description: Forged for veterans of the Scarlet Spear conflict, this Lacera has been modified to enhance nimbleness and lethality.
Ceti Lacera.name: CETI LACERA

Pulmonars.description: Pummel and infect with these two pulsating hunks of flesh connected by a ligament. Take-hold of the malignant evolution of an ancient martial weapon.
Pulmonars.name: PULMONARS

Aksomati Prime.description: The elegant Aksomati precisely refined to this, their ultimate manifestation.
Aksomati Prime.name: AKSOMATI PRIME

Fulmin.description: Strike with silent lightning or the pummeling drum of thunder. Alternate between stealthy short-range electrical discharge, and automatic lightning gun. Faster mode-switch when used by Wisp.
Fulmin.name: FULMIN

Obex.description: The Obex system multiplies the kinetic energy of a Tenno's kicks and punches, delivering devastating blows to any target.
Obex.name: OBEX

Despair.description: Used by The Stalker, Despair throwing blades have a mono-filament edge, sharp enough to penetrate a Warframe.
Despair.name: DESPAIR

Corinth Prime.description: Heavy in the hand with a bone-crunching kickback. This Prime version of this shotgun adds remote detonation of the weapon's airburst round.
Corinth Prime.name: CORINTH PRIME

Iron Staff Prime.description: A unique staff wielded by the Wukong Prime Warframe.
Iron Staff Prime.name: IRON STAFF PRIME

Akmagnus.description: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.
Akmagnus.name: AKMAGNUS

Kronen Prime.description: Ancient blades, perfected for todayâ€™s combat.
Kronen Prime.name: KRONEN PRIME

Iron Staff.description: A unique staff wielded by the Wukong Warframe.
Iron Staff.name: IRON STAFF

Convectrix.description: When its twin-lasers converge on a target a circuit is created, frying the subject.
Convectrix.name: CONVECTRIX

Akjagara.description: The design of these hard-hitting dual pistols is a mix of organic and bladed elements.
Akjagara.name: AKJAGARA

Furis.description: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.
Furis.name: FURIS

Fragor Prime.description: A beautifully forged instrument of devastation.
Fragor Prime.name: FRAGOR PRIME

Astilla Prime.description: Loose explosive glass slugs that tear through enemies with Garaâ€™s signature shotgun, presented here in its spectacular Prime form.
Astilla Prime.name: ASTILLA PRIME

Orthos Prime.description: Orthos Prime is an ancient Orokin martial weapon, forged from the purest Rubedo making it extremely light-weight.
Orthos Prime.name: ORTHOS PRIME

Bronco.description: The Bronco is a small-scale shotgun that can be wielded with one hand. Only effective at close range, it has a limited Magazine Capacity.
Bronco.name: BRONCO

Shedu.description: This arm-cannon, ripped from a Sentient, rapid-fires thermal pulses that explode in an electrical blast. Features an ammo-less quick charge capacitor, that emits a knock-back pulse and strips Sentient damage resistances when fully discharged.
Shedu.name: SHEDU

Twin Vipers.description: A Viper equipped in each hand.
Twin Vipers.name: TWIN VIPERS

Attica.description: Quickly fire off a volley of deadly bolts with the Attica repeating crossbow.
Attica.name: ATTICA

Tipedo Prime.description: With their final breath they look to the moon, and are gone.
Tipedo Prime.name: TIPEDO PRIME

Akstiletto.description: These diminutive rapid-fire Stiletto machine-pistols are just the right size to be akimbo style without sacrificing accuracy.
Akstiletto.name: AKSTILETTO

Verglas.description: Designed as the perfect mate for Nautilus, this Sentinel weapon projects an icy beam at nearby targets.
Verglas.name: VERGLAS

Mk1-kunai.description: The MK1-Kunai is the standard issue throwing knives for all Tenno.
Mk1-kunai.name: MK1-KUNAI

Sybaris Prime.description: Sleek and slender, a golden symbol of Tenno perfection.
Sybaris Prime.name: SYBARIS PRIME

Lex.description: The Lex is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low Fire Rate and Magazine Capacity. Very efficient at long range.
Lex.name: LEX

Venka.description: Utilizing a new fighting stance, this Tenno weapon turns fists into claws and enemies into messy piles of meat and scrap metal.
Venka.name: VENKA

Paris.description: Based on one of the world's oldest weapon designs, this Tenno-crafted weapon can be used both in stealth and in open combat. The Paris uses a chargeable magnetic field to launch arrows capable of impaling enemies to walls.
Paris.name: PARIS

Spectra Vandal.description: A special-order Corpus cutting tool for master crafters only. Features distinctive azurite plating and a focusing crystal of precision clarity and cut.
Spectra Vandal.name: SPECTRA VANDAL

Cobra & Crane.description: Baruuk's signature weapons: a sword for retribution, a shield for restraint. In Baruuk's hands, and his hands only, Cobra's first strike in a combo renders his foe unconscious.
Cobra & Crane.name: COBRA & CRANE

Masseter.description: Tear and chew through enemies with this unusual crankshaft-style greatsword. When wielded by Grendel he is immune to staggers and knockdowns during heavy attacks.
Masseter.name: MASSETER

Pangolin Prime.description: A classic Tenno blade, beautifully reimagined.
Pangolin Prime.name: PANGOLIN PRIME

Tekko.description: These iron fists that rip through foes are Atlas' signature weapons. When wielded by Atlas they receive a Status Chance increase.
Tekko.name: TEKKO

Lacera.description: In the practiced hands of a master, this blade and whip becomes exceedingly devastating.
Lacera.name: LACERA

Caustacyst.description: Heavy attacks from this scythe unleash a wave of acid that mutilates enemies and leaves a trail of corrosive sludge.
Caustacyst.name: CAUSTACYST

Tiberon Prime.description: Art meets ingenuity with this beautifully deadly rifle.
Tiberon Prime.name: TIBERON PRIME

Cyanex.description: Sentient tech merges with Corpus design to deliver this lethal sidearm. Fully automatic, it fires ricocheting, homing projectiles that release small clouds of Gas on impact. Alt-fire to release the entire magazine without homing as a single burst.
Cyanex.name: CYANEX

Guandao Prime.description: That a god might reap a harvest of lives.
Guandao Prime.name: GUANDAO PRIME

Akvasto.description: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.
Akvasto.name: AKVASTO

Tigris.description: The double-barreled Tigris shotgun fires two bursts in rapid succession, easily taking down the toughest prey.
Tigris.name: TIGRIS

Ballistica.description: The Ballistica crossbow features a unique dual firing mechanism. Choose between a four bolt volley or a deadly accurate charged shot.
Ballistica.name: BALLISTICA

Vulcax.description: Charges up a powerful blast of ultra-heated plasma.
Vulcax.name: VULCAX

Strun Wraith.description: A different take on a familiar shotgun, the Strun Wraith features unique styling.
Strun Wraith.name: STRUN WRAITH

Dex Sybaris.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the third anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
Dex Sybaris.name: DEX SYBARIS

Quanta Vandal.description: A customized version of the Quanta, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
Quanta Vandal.name: QUANTA VANDAL

Prisma Skana.description: Forged from raw prisma crystals and infused with Void energy, this blade's pristine edge is honed razor-sharp to eviscerate even the most deadly of foes.
Prisma Skana.name: PRISMA SKANA

Redeemer.description: Striking with massive twin blades, the Redeemer fires the killing blow with its built-in shotgun.
Redeemer.name: REDEEMER

Synapse.description: Powered by a bio-chemical reaction, the Infested Synapse rifle fries its targets with a steady stream of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive energy.
Synapse.name: SYNAPSE

Shaku.description: With these blazing fast nunchaku, the enemy will never know what hit them.
Shaku.name: SHAKU

Kraken.description: The Kraken is a heavy pistol of Grineer design that fires two quick shots with a single pull of the trigger. Skilled marksmen will appreciate the value in this deadly accurate weapon.
Kraken.name: KRAKEN

Keratinos.description: Leave your mark with these infected claws with increased heavy attack range. Heavy attack at max combo to keep the extended range and slam radius for 3 minutes.
Keratinos.name: KERATINOS

Pox.description: These festering sacs of pus and gas burst violently on impact.
Pox.name: POX

Vectis Prime.description: Once thought destroyed, the newly uncovered Vectis Prime revives Tenno martial traditions.
Vectis Prime.name: VECTIS PRIME

Cryotra.description: Emits a ray of sub-zero energy.
Cryotra.name: CRYOTRA

Marelok.description: The Marelok combines the stopping power of a rifle with the portability of a pistol.
Marelok.name: MARELOK

Fluctus.description: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.
Fluctus.name: FLUCTUS

Gammacor.description: Designed to quickly vaporize minerals for content analysis, users discovered its powerful beam was equally efficient at dispatching hostiles.
Gammacor.name: GAMMACOR

Mutalist Cernos.description: Overcome with Infestation, this bow's arrows now spread poisonous contagion to any surface they hit.
Mutalist Cernos.name: MUTALIST CERNOS

Opticor Vandal.description: With a precision crafted lens, this customized Opticor achieves a level of performance previously thought impossible.
Opticor Vandal.name: OPTICOR VANDAL

Acrid.description: The Acrid fires an acidic-infused needle.
Acrid.name: ACRID

Deconstructor Prime.description: Allows the Helios Prime to violently disassemble and turn itself into a deadly projectile.
Deconstructor Prime.name: DECONSTRUCTOR PRIME

<archwing> Agkuza.description: Tear apart incoming enemies with this massive hooked blade.
<archwing> Agkuza.name: <ARCHWING> AGKUZA

Aklex.description: Dual Lex pistols double the amount of high caliber lead you can throw at the enemy, but accuracy and reload time suffer.
Aklex.name: AKLEX

Catabolyst.description: Splatter enemies with a short-range stream of corrosive bile and then toss the ammo bladder as a grenade when reloading. The emptier the pistolâ€™s ammo bladder, the more potent its damage. A fully empty bladder packs the biggest punch.
Catabolyst.name: CATABOLYST

Twin Vipers Wraith.description: The uniquely styled Twin Vipers Wraith are a powerful variation on the standard akimbo machine-pistols.
Twin Vipers Wraith.name: TWIN VIPERS WRAITH

Gram.description: The heavy two-handed sword known as Gram requires great strength to wield, but it is notorious for its splitting power. Can hit multiple targets with each strike.
Gram.name: GRAM

Zakti.description: Fires razor-sharp darts that anchor themselves in their target before erupting in a plume of toxic gas.
Zakti.name: ZAKTI

Paracesis.description: The Sentient slayer. An offering from Ballas.
Paracesis.name: PARACESIS

Exalted Blade.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.
Exalted Blade.name: Exalted Blade

Sicarus Prime.description: The Sicarus Prime is an ornamental firearm that fires rounds in rapid bursts, providing a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.
Sicarus Prime.name: SICARUS PRIME

Skana Prime.description: A basic blade known as a Skana. It is widely used by the Tenno. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.
Skana Prime.name: SKANA PRIME

<archwing> Rathbone.description: Using Archwingâ€™s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.
<archwing> Rathbone.name: <ARCHWING> RATHBONE

Angstrum.description: Capable of firing multiple rockets at once, the Angstrum is a handheld instrument of destruction.
Angstrum.name: ANGSTRUM

Anku.description: Reap havoc with this full sized Tenno-crafted scythe.
Anku.name: ANKU

Arca Titron.description: Each successive kill from this massive electron hammer builds an electron charge that is unleashed on slam attacks.
Arca Titron.name: ARCA TITRON

Prisma Dual Cleavers.description: Blades of energized prisma crystal make these ornamental cleavers cut as sharply as they look.
Prisma Dual Cleavers.name: PRISMA DUAL CLEAVERS

Stahlta.description: Nail them to the wall! The Stahlta automatic rifle propels hardened steel rods at high speed, while a charged fire mode fuses a number of volatile rods together for a large radioactive explosion.
Stahlta.name: STAHLTA

Amphis.description: Fashioned with Grineer materials and balanced for marine infantry use, the Amphis is a traditional staff weapon that has received a monstrous makeover that enables shock damage on jump attacks. Connects with multiple enemies with each strike.
Amphis.name: AMPHIS

Embolist.description: A living weapon, the infested Embolist pistol kills its victims with an acidic venomous gas.
Embolist.name: EMBOLIST

Artax.description: Freeze targets in their tracks with this sentinel mounted ice-beam.
Artax.name: ARTAX

Tazicor.description: Burst rifle that fires electrified rounds.
Tazicor.name: TAZICOR

Talons.description: The claws of these tactical bombs dig into the target and detonate on command.
Talons.name: TALONS

Hirudo.description: Rip into the enemy with fists of razor sharp cartilage. Steals health with each critical hit.
Hirudo.name: HIRUDO

Akarius.description: Bombard legions of enemies with target seeking rockets. These dual launchers reload faster while sprinting, even more so in Gaussâ€™ hands. Rockets arm after reaching a safe distance.
Akarius.name: AKARIUS

Zakti Prime.description: A thousand pains, before their end.
Zakti Prime.name: ZAKTI PRIME

Astilla.description: Blast enemies with glass slugs that devastate on impact. In Gara's hands, this signature weapon has a larger Ammo Pool.
Astilla.name: ASTILLA

Zymos.description: Infect your foes with this spore-scattering pistol. Head shots burrow in and explode, releasing spore clouds that seek out nearby enemies.
Zymos.name: ZYMOS

Kuva Kraken.description: A custom variant that fires three quick shots with a single pull of the trigger, or can alt-fire burst the remainder of its magazine. Higher Fire Rate, Magazine Capacity and Reload Speed.
Kuva Kraken.name: KUVA KRAKEN

Sancti Magistar.description: Each charged attack turns the enemyâ€™s pain into a healing pulse that washes over allies. Also, creates resistance to Status Effects when held.
Sancti Magistar.name: SANCTI MAGISTAR

Mk1-furax.description: The MK1-Furax is the standard issue fist weapon for all Tenno.
Mk1-furax.name: MK1-FURAX

Akvasto Prime.description: Orokin craftsmanship married with superior firepower. Dual Vastos, primed and ready to strike.
Akvasto Prime.name: AKVASTO PRIME

Lato Vandal.description: A special version of the standard Lato pistol with a slower Fire Rate but offering higher Accuracy and Damage values. The Lato Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.
Lato Vandal.name: LATO VANDAL

Twin Gremlins.description: Designed as a pair, these Grineer sidearms fire projectiles at a slower rate but with greater force and accuracy.
Twin Gremlins.name: TWIN GREMLINS

Ack & Brunt.description: Tyl Regorâ€™s custom axe and shield are how he likes to eliminate â€˜frustrationsâ€™.
Ack & Brunt.name: ACK & BRUNT

Kuva Twin Stubbas.description: Double-fist rapid-fire bursts of pain with these dual-wield variants of the Grineer submachine gun. Higher Fire Rate and Magazine Capacity.
Kuva Twin Stubbas.name: KUVA TWIN STUBBAS

Orthos.description: The Tenno forged Orthos is a rare double bladed polearm. Those who take the time to master it speak of its impressive striking distance and ability to hit multiple targets.
Orthos.name: ORTHOS

Fragor.description: A large two-handed hammer, the Fragor requires great strength to wield, but impacts with enough force to send groups of enemies tumbling.
Fragor.name: FRAGOR

Atomos.description: This particle cannon generates a condensed beam of super-heated plasma designed to melt rock to ore, and enemies to molten slag.
Atomos.name: ATOMOS

Kuva Kohm.description: The Kuva Kohm variant has a higher fire rate than the original. For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kuva Kohm releases an additional bolt and grows more lethal.
Kuva Kohm.name: KUVA KOHM

Nami Skyla Prime.description: Forged by a forgotten master, these exquisite blades are bounty from a golden-age long gone.
Nami Skyla Prime.name: NAMI SKYLA PRIME

Staticor.description: Send a massive charge of potential energy hurling toward unfortunate targets.
Staticor.name: STATICOR

Broken War.description: A fragment of Stalker's War sword, a symbol of his defeat.
Broken War.name: BROKEN WAR

Sonicor.description: Blasts targets with a massive wave of sonic energy. Results reported to be: 'Very Satisfying'.
Sonicor.name: SONICOR

Ninkondi Prime.description: An ancient weapon imbued with a new truth.
Ninkondi Prime.name: NINKONDI PRIME

Zylok.description: Hammer the enemy with this light-bodied heavy hitter. Featuring a double-action trigger that fires hard and fast.
Zylok.name: ZYLOK

Karak.description: Solid, dependable and deadly. The Karak is a standard issue rifle in many Grineer platoons.
Karak.name: KARAK

Pyrana.description: Chew through the enemy with this vicious automatic hand shotgun.
Pyrana.name: PYRANA

Vaykor Sydon.description: Justice blinds. Block hits to charge a Radial Blind, when fully charged Block+Heavy Attack to unleash it.
Vaykor Sydon.name: VAYKOR SYDON

Synoid Simulor.description: Cephalon Sudaâ€™s custom issue Simulor was built to satisfy her curiosity.
Synoid Simulor.name: SYNOID SIMULOR

Dera.description: The Dera is a repeater that fires super-heated plasma.
Dera.name: DERA

Galatine Prime.description: Only Tenno were strong enough to wield this noble beast of a weapon.
Galatine Prime.name: GALATINE PRIME

Galvacord.description: Shock and maim with this heavyweight retractable whip.
Galvacord.name: GALVACORD

Hind.description: A powerful mid-range rifle used by Grineer shock troops, the Hind fires in five round bursts.
Hind.name: HIND

Pangolin Sword.description: A unique blade used by an old Tenno clan.
Pangolin Sword.name: PANGOLIN SWORD

Seer.description: Captain Vor's prized Orokin-Grineer hybrid pistol has an average rate of fire, but it has high damage and superior zoom capabilities.
Seer.name: SEER

Kronen.description: The Kronen resurrects a lethal fighting style once thought lost to the ages.
Kronen.name: KRONEN

Grattler.description: Shatter your targets with explosive shells from this devastating Archwing cannon.
Grattler.name: GRATTLER

Prisma Grakata.description: Encased in plates refined from pure prisma crystals, this rare element gives this assault rifle a radiant luster.
Prisma Grakata.name: PRISMA GRAKATA

Serro.description: Developed as an energy saw to scrap obsolete ships, this tool was quickly banned when rebels in the Sedna region discovered it also made an excellent weapon.
Serro.name: SERRO

Boltor Prime.description: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper.
Boltor Prime.name: BOLTOR PRIME

War.description: The Stalker's sword as bestowed on him by the Sentient Hunhow.
War.name: WAR

Vaykor Marelok.description: Taken from defeated Grineer commanders and rebuilt to improve combat efficiency and reliability.
Vaykor Marelok.name: VAYKOR MARELOK

Vulklok.description: Standard issue sniper rifle for Diriga.
Vulklok.name: VULKLOK

Ballistica Prime.description: The beauty of this luxuriously gilded crossbow cannot obscure its lethal purpose.
Ballistica Prime.name: BALLISTICA PRIME

Velox.description: With a high fire rate, ammo efficiency and rapid reload when emptied, this unusual sidearm can hand out carnage all day long. Ammo efficiency is further increased when Protea uses this, her signature weapon.
Velox.name: VELOX

Fusilai.description: Silently lacerate enemies with Gara's signature glass throwing knives. Increased Projectile Speed when wielded by Gara.
Fusilai.name: FUSILAI

Proboscis Cernos.description: Each arrow spawns a swarm of sticky appendages on impact. These tongue-like probes latch onto nearby unfortunates and drag them close before bursting into a mess of diseased goo.
Proboscis Cernos.name: PROBOSCIS CERNOS

Braton.description: The Braton's high rate of fire and accuracy make it a favorite among the Tenno.
Braton.name: BRATON

Sporothrix.description: This long-distance rifle fires a razor-sharp, virus-soaked barb that continues to attack its host before violently erupting in a spore-laden mist. Scoped headshots increase lethality.
Sporothrix.name: SPOROTHRIX

Aksomati.description: The devastating power of the Soma rifle compacted into two elegant pistols.
Aksomati.name: AKSOMATI

<archwing> Veritux.description: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.
<archwing> Veritux.name: <ARCHWING> VERITUX

Nikana Prime.description: An ancient blade predating the fall of the Orokin Empire. Forged using techniques lost over the centuries, the edge remains sharper than that of any modern Nikana.
Nikana Prime.name: NIKANA PRIME

Krohkur.description: This hooked blade rewards critical hits to those skilled enough to strike with finesse.
Krohkur.name: KROHKUR

Kuva Chakkhurr.description: Detonate heads with this slow-firing rifle that rewards precision.
Kuva Chakkhurr.name: KUVA CHAKKHURR

Furax Wraith.description: These Wraith gauntlets have been augmented for power.
Furax Wraith.name: FURAX WRAITH

Athodai.description: Reverse-engineered from propulsion tech this hand-cannon packs a kick. Headshots kills trigger Overdrive, locking off secondary functions while maximizing your fire rate and ammo efficiency for a short time.
Athodai.name: ATHODAI

Glaive Prime.description: The Glaive Prime is a deadly and beautiful weapon from the Orokin era. The blades are as effective in close quarters as they are when thrown at distant enemies.
Glaive Prime.name: GLAIVE PRIME

Mausolon.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati for use by their Necramechs. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. Punishing automatic primary fire and a secondary mode that charges up to unleash a destructive beam of energy with a large explosion at point of impact.
Mausolon.name: MAUSOLON

Battacor.description: A weapon that builds charge the more it kills. Hit capacity then release for an obliterating discharge of power.
Battacor.name: BATTACOR

Stradavar.description: A high-capacity, high-damage enforcer, this weapon can switch between the high crit semi-automatic and full automatic firing modes.
Stradavar.name: STRADAVAR

Hek.description: The Hek is a powerful shotgun that fires its shots with a tight spread, making it efficient at medium range as long as its strong recoil is properly managed.
Hek.name: HEK

Afuris.description: Furis pistols equipped in each hand. Twice the Magazine Capacity and slightly faster Fire Rate, but Accuracy and Reload Speed are lowered.
Afuris.name: AFURIS

Kuva Nukor.description: A highly-optimized Nukor that allows for the weaponâ€™s microwave field to hit up to four additional targets.
Kuva Nukor.name: KUVA NUKOR

Lato.description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere.
Lato.name: LATO

Hikou.description: As an alternative to Kunai, these Tenno throwing stars do cause less Damage but they come with expanded Ammo Capacity and a higher Fire Rate.
Hikou.name: HIKOU

Nikana.description: The Nikana reintroduces a lost Tenno blade and with it another fragment of the old ways.
Nikana.name: NIKANA

Prova Vandal.description: A customized version of the vicious Prova, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
Prova Vandal.name: PROVA VANDAL

Bronco Prime.description: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased Magazine Capacity and damage for a lower rate of fire.
Bronco Prime.name: BRONCO PRIME

Kreska.description: This unsophisticated Corpus survival tool does what it was designed for: hacking and splitting whatever it strikes.
Kreska.name: KRESKA

Valkyr Talons.description: These talons emerge when Valkyr unleashes her Hysteria.
Valkyr Talons.name: VALKYR TALONS

Guandao.description: Harvest the enemy with this towering polearm.
Guandao.name: GUANDAO

Broken Scepter.description: A shattered talisman of the Grineer Elder Queen. It pulls health orbs from deceased enemies and energy orbs from destroyed robots.
Broken Scepter.name: BROKEN SCEPTER

Sybaris.description: This Tenno crafted, lever action rifle, is equal parts elegance and executioner.
Sybaris.name: SYBARIS

Morgha.description: Blast through enemies with a double-barreled shot of energized slugs. This siphons their life essence which is then used to generate the secondary fire's massive air-burst mortar. The ancient Entrati weapon was built for Necramechs but also functions as an Archgun.
Morgha.name: MORGHA

Azima.description: This intricate automatic pistol is able to fire its magazine which then spins in the air for a short time, firing lasers at nearby enemies.
Azima.name: AZIMA

Kestrel.description: The Kestrel boomerang is a heavy throwing weapon that can knock down enemies at a distance.
Kestrel.name: KESTREL

Sweeper.description: Standard issue weapon for Carrier Sentinel. Fires shotgun rounds.
Sweeper.name: SWEEPER

Hikou Prime.description: As deadly as any bullet without the associated noise or commotion.
Hikou Prime.name: HIKOU PRIME

Akstiletto Prime.description: Stylish, discreet and accurate, perfect for the Tenno of distinction.
Akstiletto Prime.name: AKSTILETTO PRIME

<archwing> Kaszas.description: Become an angel of death, with this Archwing scythe.
<archwing> Kaszas.name: <ARCHWING> KASZAS

Quassus.description: Flick away the enemy with this heavy warfan. The Quassus scatters ethereal daggers that are even more deadly accurate when wielded by Xaku.
Quassus.name: QUASSUS

Destreza Prime.description: Take mastery to the next level with this primed rapier.
Destreza Prime.name: DESTREZA PRIME

Kunai.description: Kunai throwing daggers offer a silent alternative to the traditional side arm. Perfect for assassins.
Kunai.name: KUNAI

Euphona Prime.description: Banshee Primeâ€™s signature shotgun is an instrument of devastation that fires both focused and broad shots.
Euphona Prime.name: EUPHONA PRIME

Gram Prime.description: Born anew, the father of swords returns.
Gram Prime.name: GRAM PRIME

Prisma Machete.description: The addition of Prisma Crystal allows this otherwise barbaric weapon to elegantly hack through any foe.
Prisma Machete.name: PRISMA MACHETE

Zhuge.description: This devastating automatic crossbow is the perfect marriage of ancient Earth weaponry and Tenno technology.
Zhuge.name: ZHUGE

Destreza.description: Elevate martial combat into an art form with this Tenno rapier.
Destreza.name: DESTREZA

Twin Basolk.description: These nasty, little hatchets slice through steel as if it were flesh.
Twin Basolk.name: TWIN BASOLK

Dark Split-sword.description: Use as a devastating heavy sword or apply a Dual Melee stance and split the weapon into two ferocious blades.
Dark Split-sword.name: DARK SPLIT-SWORD

Rubico Prime.description: For the hunter, the apex of the sniper's art. For the hunted, a gateway to the next life.
Rubico Prime.name: RUBICO PRIME

Dual Raza.description: Razor sharp battle-hatchets, designed to compliment the Soma.
Dual Raza.name: DUAL RAZA

<archwing> Onorix.description: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.
<archwing> Onorix.name: <ARCHWING> ONORIX

Glaxion.description: Fires a photon beam that halts molecular vibrations, causing instant and painful freezing.
Glaxion.name: GLAXION

Exalted Umbra Blade.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.
Exalted Umbra Blade.name: EXALTED UMBRA BLADE

Stropha.description: A short-blade melee weapon with an ace up its sleeve. Send nearby enemies flying with a powerful short-range shockwave.
Stropha.name: STROPHA

Scoliac.description: The Scoliac Whip is a nasty parasitic growth of sinew and bone that can inflict heart stopping <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage with attacks.
Scoliac.name: SCOLIAC

Javlok.description: Launch super-heated slugs at individual foes, or hurl the entire weapon and ignite groups of enemies in a flash inferno.
Javlok.name: JAVLOK

Boltace.description: An intimidating Tonfa set designed to match the briary design of the Boltor.
Boltace.name: BOLTACE

Dual Keres.description: Tear through any target with these vicious, claw-like blades. The signature swords of Khora.
Dual Keres.name: DUAL KERES

Dual Ichor.description: The fast and brutal Dual Ichor axes will quickly tear through enemies with a high probability of inflicting Critical Damage.
Dual Ichor.name: DUAL ICHOR

Quanta.description: This weapon was designed to assist with the excavation of mineral deposits from large asteroids, but has been adapted for military purposes.
Quanta.name: QUANTA

Vitrica.description: The sword the fabled Orokin executioner Nihil used to glass the condemned. Swing while Aim Gliding to glass enemies. A Ground Slam will smash nearby glassed foes, while sending forward a narrow shockwave to shatter distant ones. A Heavy Slam sends forth a wider shockwave with greater force.
Vitrica.name: VITRICA

Gazal Machete.description: Each kill with this swooping blade adds bonus damage to the Djinn Sentinelâ€™s next Fatal Attraction ability. In turn, Fatal Attraction bestows the weapon with a period of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage.
Gazal Machete.name: GAZAL MACHETE

Venka Prime.description: Gleaming blades of white draw blood of the deepest red.
Venka Prime.name: VENKA PRIME

<archwing> Knux.description: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.
<archwing> Knux.name: <ARCHWING> KNUX

Basmu.description: This Sentient war instrument can either barrage targets with explosive bolts, or, draw on its regenerative battery to create twin plasma beams that chain through targets. When fully drained, Health is leached from nearby foes for a short period.
Basmu.name: BASMU

Hema.description: A bloodsucker. This symbiotic burst-rifle leeches health to forge its ammo and then restores health with each headshot.
Hema.name: HEMA

Jat Kittag.description: Deliver crushing blows with this Grineer built, jet powered mace.
Jat Kittag.name: JAT KITTAG

Latron Prime.description: The ornamental Latron Prime exploits ancient Orokin technology to get a slight damage increase over the standard Latron.
Latron Prime.name: LATRON PRIME

Dual Kamas Prime.description: The sensual lines of these golden Kamas have long been celebrated as a masterwork of Tenno weapon smithing.
Dual Kamas Prime.name: DUAL KAMAS PRIME

Dual Zoren.description: Short axes held in each hand. High attack speed and can hit multiple targets. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
Dual Zoren.name: DUAL ZOREN

Magistar.description: The Magistar mace wields justice and truth in the form of bone-crushing blows.
Magistar.name: MAGISTAR

Snipetron.description: Manufactured by the Corpus, the Snipetron is a powerful and accurate rifle that sports optical zoom capabilities. Perfect for long range engagements.
Snipetron.name: SNIPETRON

Mk1-strun.description: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.
Mk1-strun.name: MK1-STRUN

Vasto.description: Steady and reliable, the Vasto revolver combines speed and power for a classic gunslinger feel.
Vasto.name: VASTO

Akzani.description: The choice weapon of Mirage, these fast-firing dual pistols deliver a deadly performance.
Akzani.name: AKZANI

Karyst Prime.description: This master blade is the heavier, oversized and far more lethal version of the signature weapon of an extinct order of Tenno assassins.
Karyst Prime.name: KARYST PRIME

Secura Penta.description: Ruthless and efficient, just like the free-market.
Secura Penta.name: SECURA PENTA

Akbolto Prime.description: Gilded rails adorn these two vicious bolt launching pistols.
Akbolto Prime.name: AKBOLTO PRIME

Dakra Prime.description: The Dakra Prime is a Tenno forged weapon, crafted during the time of the Orokin. It is renowned for speed, power and the ability to hit multiple targets.
Dakra Prime.name: DAKRA PRIME

Secura Dual Cestra.description: The favored side-arms of Perrin Sequence executives, these pistols have been modified to improve efficiency and killing potential.
Secura Dual Cestra.name: SECURA DUAL CESTRA

Mk1-bo.description: The MK1-Bo is the standard issue staff weapon for all Tenno.
Mk1-bo.name: MK1-BO

Ether Reaper.description: With a blade forged from the same material as the Ether Sword, the Ether Reaper delivers quick death to its victims.
Ether Reaper.name: ETHER REAPER

Prisma Obex.description: Dazzle, distract and destroy with these sparring weapons of impossibly hard prisma crystal.
Prisma Obex.name: PRISMA OBEX

Phage.description: Fires seven beams of continuous biochemical energy which depletes the life of any surface they contact.
Phage.name: PHAGE

Telos Akbolto.description: For the Arbiters of Hexis these pistols are more than simple weapons, they are symbols of truth and discipline.
Telos Akbolto.name: TELOS AKBOLTO

Desert Wind.description: Baruuk channels the desert wind to turn his fists and feet into an exalted weapon.
Desert Wind.name: Desert Wind

Dark Sword.description: A blade forged using dark metals, capable of delivering innate <DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage with attacks.
Dark Sword.name: DARK SWORD

Exergis.description: Feel the kick of this Corpus shotgun as it shatters a high-yield crystal into anyone and anything standing in your way.
Exergis.name: EXERGIS

Bolto.description: The Bolto fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
Bolto.name: BOLTO

Fang Prime.description: A set of ceremonial daggers from the Orokin era, the Fang Prime's blades resonate violently as they strike. This allows them to pierce hardened materials like armor with ease.
Fang Prime.name: FANG PRIME

Telos Boltace.description: Spinning attacks unleash the Stormpath, a tempest of mayhem that hurls any foes in its way.
Telos Boltace.name: TELOS BOLTACE

Wolf Sledge.description: The signature weapon of the only lunatic fearsome enough to bust out of the Saturn Six Max-Pen. Once loosed this formidable throwing hammer always finds its way home.
Wolf Sledge.name: WOLF SLEDGE

Mk1-paris.description: The MK1-Paris is the standard issue bow for all Tenno.
Mk1-paris.name: MK1-PARIS

Nami Solo.description: Evoking the oceans of earth, this exquisite cutlass is a deadly work of art.
Nami Solo.name: NAMI SOLO

Burston.description: The Burston fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of automatic rifles and the accuracy of semi-automatic rifles.
Burston.name: BURSTON

Argonak.description: Pick off targets by highlighting distant enemies using this Grineer rifle's advanced laser sighting system. Deadly in both single fire and automatic modes.
Argonak.name: ARGONAK

Xoris.description: An obscure glaive weapon of Corpus provenance, intrinsically linked to Specter technology. The Xoris strikes rapidly and with great devastation. It is capable of chaining combos infinitely.
Xoris.name: XORIS

Latron Wraith.description: The Latron Wraith is a powerful variation of the standard, semi-automatic rifle that features unique styling.
Latron Wraith.name: LATRON WRAITH

Kogake Prime.description: Deliver a golden knockout with these prime Melee Weapons.
Kogake Prime.name: KOGAKE PRIME

Zhuge Prime.description: Tenno artistry. Ancient craft. A weapon of surgical precision and devastating effect. Each bolt fired by Zhuge Prime explodes shortly after embedding.
Zhuge Prime.name: ZHUGE PRIME

Komorex.description: Corpus ingenuity leveraging Tau-tech to create a high-capacity bi-modal sniper weapon of terrifying capability. Zoom in to reduce recoil and add punch through. Zoom again to fire a bursting viral round, but with a lower rate of fire. Komorex features built-in ammo conversion.
Komorex.name: KOMOREX

Mk1-furis.description: The MK1-Furis are the standard issue automatic pistol for all Tenno.
Mk1-furis.name: MK1-FURIS

Kuva Bramma.description: This Grineer bow delivers vengeance in the form of clusterbomb-tipped arrows that can be detonated mid-air or on impact. Low quiver capacity, arrows are recovered singly.
Kuva Bramma.name: KUVA BRAMMA

Lex Prime.description: The Lex Prime is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low Fire Rate and Magazine Capacity. Very efficient at long range.
Lex Prime.name: LEX PRIME

Boar Prime.description: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher Fire Rate, Magazine Capacity and a much higher per-shot damage.
Boar Prime.name: BOAR PRIME

Twin Grakatas.description: When one Grakata isn't enough, bring another for extra firepower.
Twin Grakatas.name: TWIN GRAKATAS

Braton Prime.description: A classic Orokin weapon, Braton Prime features modified damage levels and a larger magazine over the standard model.
Braton Prime.name: BRATON PRIME

Imperator.description: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.
Imperator.name: IMPERATOR

Quellor.description: The Quellor was standard-issue to Dax Railjack crews of the Old War, dating back to the earliest, pre-Sigma craft. A rapid-fire assault rifle with a hefty magazine-size, the Quellor is an all-round workhorse. Also capable of large, short-range cryo-blasts.
Quellor.name: QUELLOR

Dual Decurion.description: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.
Dual Decurion.name: DUAL DECURION

Dual Cestra.description: Wield two Cestras to unleash a dual torrent of high energy bolts.
Dual Cestra.name: DUAL CESTRA

Stradavar Prime.description: Between measured staccato and staggering crescendo, Stradavar Prime never fails to call down a devastating finale.
Stradavar Prime.name: STRADAVAR PRIME

Flux Rifle.description: Laser Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.
Flux Rifle.name: FLUX RIFLE

Arca Scisco.description: This scoped pistol analyzes strikes, learning how to damage its targets most effectively. Achieve maximum damage output after five successive hits.
Arca Scisco.name: ARCA SCISCO

Cestra.description: Compact and deadly, the Cestra discharges bolts of energy at an increasingly rapid rate.
Cestra.name: CESTRA

Pandero.description: Octavia's pistol hammers foes with single shots or a rapid volley of bullets. When wielded by Octavia, alt-fire Headshot Kills increase Reload Speed.
Pandero.name: PANDERO

Sicarus.description: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.
Sicarus.name: SICARUS

Galatine.description: With massive charged power and the ability to hit up to five foes in a single swing, the Galatine sword is the heavy artillery of Melee Weapons.
Galatine.name: GALATINE

Sancti Tigris.description: Echo nature's violent beauty with this special Tigris.
Sancti Tigris.name: SANCTI TIGRIS

Baza.description: Make easy prey of enemies with this quiet, agile, and pinpoint accurate Tenno submachine gun.
Baza.name: BAZA

Dual Toxocyst.description: Brain-strikes excite this bioweapon, causing it to rapidly release toxic munitions.
Dual Toxocyst.name: DUAL TOXOCYST

Panthera.description: Firing high-velocity blades, this weapon can also be used as a battle-saw, shredding anything unfortunate enough to get within range.
Panthera.name: PANTHERA

Harpak.description: Spike enemies to the wall or reel them in with this burst harpoon gun.
Harpak.name: HARPAK

Zarr.description: Unload a barrage of explosives or a huge shot of flak from this cannonâ€™s enormous barrel.
Zarr.name: ZARR

Deth Machine Rifle Prime.description: Signature default weapon of Dethcube Prime.
Deth Machine Rifle Prime.name: DETH MACHINE RIFLE PRIME

Drakgoon.description: The Drakgoon flak cannon sends volleys of intensely hot shrapnel ricocheting around the room. Can be fired in wide or concentrated bursts.
Drakgoon.name: DRAKGOON

Larkspur.description: From death blooms the Larkspur. A unique and menacing Archgun with a wild initial attack that locks onto a target then chains other targets close to the first. It also sports an explosive projectile mode. In Hildryn's grip the Larkspur carries more reserve ammo.
Larkspur.name: LARKSPUR

Kesheg.description: Slice through mobs of unruly enemies with this fierce halberd; the signature weapon of the Kuva Guardians.
Kesheg.name: KESHEG

Bo Prime.description: A classic Orokin weapon, Bo Prime creates elegant fury on the battlefield.
Bo Prime.name: BO PRIME

Fang.description: These matching stilettos have increased attack speed and can unleash a flurry of multi-hit attacks.
Fang.name: FANG

Dark Dagger.description: This short blade weapon forged using dark metals has limited range but comes out fast.
Dark Dagger.name: DARK DAGGER

Secura Lecta.description: Whip the enemy out of their ill-gotten gains; double credit drops on kills.
Secura Lecta.name: SECURA LECTA

Ignis Wraith.description: A blood-red variant of this destructive flamethrower.
Ignis Wraith.name: IGNIS WRAITH

Simulor.description: Creates miniature gravitational singularities that can be used for scientific study or self-defense.
Simulor.name: SIMULOR

Burst Laser.description: Fires a small burst of lasers.
Burst Laser.name: BURST LASER

Vasto Prime.description: This elegant rapid-fire revolver is the embodiment of superior Orokin craftsmanship.
Vasto Prime.name: VASTO PRIME
